description:
cmd/gc: simplify and fix defaultlit.

Fixes issue 4882.
Fixes issue 4936.
Fixes issue 4937.

messages.text:
On 2013/03/01 17:26:33, DMorsing wrote:
> LGTM
> 
> This is really nice. Cleaning up the ideal->non-ideal conversion minefield is
> sorely needed.

I'm indeed happy that it looks simpler (IMO) than the approach used in go/types. Do you think you can find a case where it fails?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2013/02/28 21:57:04, remyoudompheng wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Doesn't break Juju.

LGTM

This is really nice. Cleaning up the ideal->non-ideal conversion minefield is sorely needed.

On 2013/03/01 18:18:22, remyoudompheng wrote:
> Do you think you can find a case where it fails?

I did some testing with the spec as a reference. Didn't find anything out of the ordinary so far.

ping
Daniel has LGTM'd, I would submit tomorrow unless someone finds a bug or thinks more tests are needed.
